thread.title: BRIEF-Honeywell Announces Alessandro Gili As CFO For Transportation Systems Spin

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Honeywell Announces Alessandro Gili As CFO For Transportation Systems Spin

organizations.name: transportation systems spin honeywell international inc

text:
Honeywell International Inc:
* HONEYWELL ANNOUNCES ALESSANDRO GILI AS CFO FOR TRANSPORTATION SYSTEMS SPIN
* HONEYWELL - PRIOR TO GILIâ€™S CURRENT ROLE, HE SERVED AS VP, CORPORATE CONTROLLER, AND CAO FOR FIAT CHRYSLER AUTOMOBILES
* HONEYWELL - PLANNED TRANSPORTATION SYSTEMS SPIN IS EXPECTED TO BE COMPLETED BY END OF Q3 OF 2018
* HONEYWELL - PLANNED HOMES SPIN IS EXPECTED TO BE COMPLETED BY END OF 2018
* HONEYWELL - GILI NAMED CFO FOR TRANSPORTATION SYSTEMS BUSINESS, POSITION HE PREVIOUSLY HELD WITH FERRARI SINCE 2015 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
